text:
Here in Australia, we do alot of backburning like the Aboriginals have many thousands of years before us.

The fires are getting worse and worse each year because our government at the moment put a stop to alot of the backburning and another environmental party closed off to many of the fire trails that people use or need to use when there is a fire.

The fires are not the issue, Australia has been naturally doing this since whenever.... our government and their complete disregard for climate change, is the real issue here.
